name: Pumpkin Drop
description:
This is just a stupid game that I made for Halloween. It's a tower defense game about dropping pumpkin bombs on ghosts to keep them from entering your house. Again, this was made in about 30 minutes, so don't expect the best quality. So yeah hope you enjoy!

If you want to play this on Gamejolt, click here!: http://gamejolt.com/games/pumpkin-drop/105451
